body_html: My issue is already exists in TF 1.0. @benwu232 Thanks for your comment. I will test your solution but I see the leak on my validation code. till now I cant find the problem. in my validation code leak happened only after the first load of graph parameters (checkpoint), after validate one checkpoint and load another checkpoint, I don't see any leak in htop. I will investigate more on this problem. I don't thing the saver is the cause, I see the steady leak on training, I save the checkpoint every 5000 iteration but leak exists in this intervals.

body: My issue is already exists in TF 1.0. @benwu232 Thanks for your comment. I will test your solution but I see the leak on my validation code. till now I cant find the problem. in my validation code leak happened only after the first load of graph parameters (checkpoint), after validate one checkpoint and load another checkpoint, I don't see any leak in htop. I will investigate more on this problem. I don't thing the saver is the cause, I see the steady leak on training, I save the checkpoint every 5000 iteration but leak exists in this intervals.
